Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: wire up unused code and complete async LLM rewrite

Production hardening fixes:
- caliber-llm: Complete async rewrite with ProviderAdapter, Echo/Ping
  discovery, CircuitBreaker, EventListener, routing strategies
- caliber-pg: Migrated all agent/delegation/handoff/conflict functions
  from HashMap to real Postgres SQL via SPI
- caliber-pcp: Added LintingConfig/StalenessConfig, removed hard-coded
  constants \(MAX_ARTIFACT_SIZE, MIN_CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD, stale_hours\)
- caliber-agents: LockManager moved to #[cfg\(test\)] \(test-only mock\)
- caliber-dsl: Wired up arb_simple_filter_expr\(\) in arb_injection_def\(\)
- caliber-llm: health_cache_ttl now actually used in LeastLatency routing
- caliber-test-utils: Added Turn, Lock, Message to EntityType match

156 tests pass, 0 warnings.
